creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: dramatic rock formations in upper half with waterfall at UR; clouds or mist at center; rock formation continues at L and lower half with waterfall; inscription ULQ
inscription: [Baen ni Hitsu-I o narai, Baika-ya ni sha su] (after the manner of Ma Yuan, painted at baika-ya)
markings: marks on L side when rolled, in pencil: [Baitei Waterfall]; seals UL center, rectangular intaglio; UL edge, rectangular intaglio: [  紀梅亭印 ] (Ki Baitei in); sticker on R roller end: [Baitei (?)]
title: Waterfall after Ma Yuan
